Some say you have to change your IP + clear cookies/cache every 10 times

Clear cookies/cache: on Chrome press Ctrl+ Shift + Del and choose to clear

Change IP: On Windows : Start>Run>cmd. Type ipconfig/release and after it's 
done, type ipconfig/renew.
